REA: Allows us to perform repeated, stereotypical activities, such as walking, and maintains coordination and balance.

QTEXT: Q2. Structure B is an example of...
REA: This is the corpus callosum - it connects identical points in the right and left cerebral hemispheres.
The pituitary gland is part of the hypothalamus, and is connected to the main part of the hypothalamus by the pituitary stalk.
The pons is the middle rounded part of the brainstem, sandwiched between the medulla below and the midbrain above.
This is the frontal lobe, the most rostral/cranial part of the brain.
